title: Deployment Phasing
subtitle: Phased Rollout Strategy â€” From Pilot Corridors to Inter-Emirate Expansion

phases.name: Pilot Corridors
phases.scope: 3 school zone corridors (6 schools, 12 camera nodes) in Abu Dhabi central district.
training: Executive briefing on Command Brief interpretation
Governance team training on audit export procedures

deliverables.name: Pilot Deployment Package
deliverables.description: Deployed UI with static mock data, validated against Appendix A schemas.

deliverables.name: Operator Training Materials
deliverables.description: Documentation for each tier's interface, workflow procedures, and escalation paths.

deliverables.name: Validation Report
deliverables.description: Runtime validation results confirming schema compliance across all pilot scenarios.

exitCriteria: All 3 corridors reporting telemetry within SLA thresholds
Zero critical validation failures over 30-day observation period
Operator proficiency assessment completed for all assigned personnel
Executive stakeholder sign-off on Command Brief accuracy

phases.name: District Integration
phases.scope: Full Abu Dhabi district coverage: 15 school zones, 45 camera nodes, integrated signal control.
integrations: Identity provider integration for role-based access

deliverables.name: District Deployment Package
deliverables.description: Production-grade deployment with live data pipelines replacing static mocks.

deliverables.name: Integration Validation Report
deliverables.description: End-to-end integration test results for all connected systems.

deliverables.name: SLA Baseline Report
deliverables.description: 30-day performance baseline establishing production SLA metrics.

exitCriteria: All 15 zones operational with live data feeds
Signal control integration validated in controlled environment
SLA metrics meet or exceed defined thresholds for 30 consecutive days
Governance audit demonstrates full traceability chain

phases.name: Emirate-Wide Deployment
phases.scope: All school zones across Abu Dhabi Emirate: 60+ zones, 200+ camera nodes, multi-district coordination.
training: Executive reporting and KPI interpretation workshops

deliverables.name: Emirate Deployment Package
deliverables.description: Scaled infrastructure supporting emirate-wide coverage with regional aggregation.

deliverables.name: Cross-District Correlation Report
deliverables.description: Validated incident correlation across district boundaries.

deliverables.name: Governance Compliance Certificate
deliverables.description: Independent audit confirming compliance with all Appendix A requirements.

exitCriteria: All emirate school zones operational and reporting
Emirate-level executive dashboard validated by senior leadership
Full compliance audit passed with no critical findings

phases.name: Inter-Emirate Expansion
phases.scope: Expansion to additional UAE emirates with federated governance and standardized integration contracts.
integrations: Federated data exchange protocol between emirates
Standardized API contracts for inter-emirate interoperability
training: Technology transfer and knowledge sharing program

deliverables.name: Federation Architecture
deliverables.description: Documented architecture for multi-emirate data exchange and governance.

deliverables.name: National Standards Package
deliverables.description: Standardized contracts, schemas, and procedures for national adoption.

deliverables.name: Expansion Readiness Assessment
deliverables.description: Technical and operational readiness evaluation for each target emirate.

exitCriteria: Federation protocol validated between at least 2 emirates
National governance framework ratified by participating authorities
Standardized contracts adopted by all participating entities
Scalability validated through load testing at national scale projections
